privacy.policy1: BetoTech Digital Solutions respects your privacy and is committed to protecting the personal data of its users, in accordance with the General Data Protection Law (Law No. 13.709/2018 – LGPD). We collect only the information strictly necessary to improve your experience on our website, respond to contact requests, and provide our services with quality.

privacy.policy5: Under the terms of the LGPD, you may request at any time: access, review, update, or deletion of your personal data, except in cases where there is a legal obligation to retain them. To exercise your rights, please contact us through the channels provided on our website.
